comment.author: 41373397@N07
comment._content: Was this loco built especially for suburban or commuter service?

comment.author: 47013386@N06
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/41373397@N07]   yes, these were used in the Brisbane suburban service up to the mid 1960s and were called "Blue Babies" since they were painted light blue.
